definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
see 吃閉門羹|吃闭门羹[chi1 bi4 men2 geng1]
to be refused entrance (idiom)/to find the door closed
leftovers from a meal/fig. remnants handed down from others
yōkan, gelatin dessert typically made from red bean paste, agar, and sugar, sold in block form
lit. a cup of soup/fig. to get part of the profits/one's share of the action
nothing but herb soup and dry provisions to eat (idiom); to survive on a coarse diet/à la guerre comme à la guerre
nothing but herb soup and dry provisions to eat (idiom); to survive on a coarse diet/à la guerre comme à la guerre
to close the door in one's face (idiom)

sentences.english: What's more, I have got what I need. It is I that should thank you.
sentences.chinese: 再說，我也分得一杯羹，應該謝你纔對。

sentences.english: Su reading a poem "the wild around the water chestnut wheat demand, strong as a mountain soup cooking shag."
sentences.chinese: 讀蘇東坡詩句“時繞麥田求野薺，強爲僧舍煮山羹。”

sentences.english: The commander in chief specially lets the pantry arrange a silverfish thick soup, do you see to still make?
sentences.chinese: 總司令特別讓廚房準備了一份銀魚羹，你看可還使得？

sentences.english: But biting off a chunk of the China market is easier said than done.
sentences.chinese: 但是，真要分得中國市場一杯羹卻是說來容易做時難。

sentences.english: But other chains may still thrive through market segmentation, said Wang at Hanting Hotels.
sentences.chinese: 但其他連鎖仍能獲益於市場分化而分得一杯羹。

sentences.english: But everyone wants a share of the market.
sentences.chinese: 但是每個人都想在市場裏分得一勺羹。

sentences.english: When wheat and wild around hirsute, strong as shag boiled soup.
sentences.chinese: 時繞麥田求野薺，強爲僧舍煮羹。

sentences.english: Snake soup is among the most treasured soups in China.
sentences.chinese: 在中國，蛇羹是最珍貴的湯餚之一。

sentences.english: They've been slaughtered by outside commercial fishermen supplying the shark-fin soup market.
sentences.chinese: 它們被外國商業漁民屠宰後把魚翅供應給湯羹市場。

sentences.english: So what does integral actual strength rely on to divide relative to weaker BT take a cup of a thick soup?
sentences.chinese: 那麼整體實力相對較弱的BT靠什麼來分取一杯羹呢？

definition: soup/hot or boiling water/decoction of medicinal herbs/water in which sth has been boiled
white broth, or milky broth: an unctuous, milky white pork broth of Chinese cuisine
first bouillon, a broth made with ingredients that may later be reboiled to make a second bouillon 二湯|二汤[er4 tang1]
